title: Retro Legends [Deduped & Deheadered]
description:
Reupload of https://thepiratebay.mn/torrent/6144865/6666_in_1%5BROM_PACK%5D_RETRO_LEGENDS_%5BNES-SNES-NeoGeo-GBA-Mame-Sega with duplicate roms removed (as determined by file hashes via fdupes) and compressed with 7zip (www.7zip.org, get it, better than any other archiver you can find).

SNES roms have had their headers removed via nsrt (512 byte padding that is not present on the original rom and throws off rom checksums) and deinterleaved (causes errors with some emulators).

If this does well I can alter the torrent per the commenter's requests
